entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
